title: Toggling the Left shift key opens and closes the Bookmarks tab in firefox.
content: Toggling the left Shift key opens and closes the bookmarks tab on the left side of screen. Its very annoying when wanting typing capitals. Also the left Alt button opens the media player. Both these started doing so by themselves. The right buttons of these keys operate as normal. How to turn these off.
creator: lcollodetti

title: Bank ID app
content:
Hello. The Bank ID app does not work on Firefox, it is not possible to log in to e.g. DNB

Best regards Stig Collin Jenssen
creator: stig11

title: Problemi audio con ultimo Aggiornamento Firefox su MacOS
content: Salve, dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento (127.0.2) su sistema operativo OSX 13.6.7 ho riscontrato problemi con l'uscita audio del Browser. Il mio convertitore Audio Ã¨ impostato per avere l'uscita audio di default su Output 31-32 (cosi impostato anche sul sistema). Fino all'ultimo aggiornamento l'audio seguiva regolarmente le impostazioni del sistema operativo, mentre ora Firefox forza le uscite su Output 1-2. Come posso risolvere il problema?
creator: gianlucasiscaro

title: Right click context
content:
Help on stopping my Right-click-context of "Search Google for..." from doing a search on Yahoo?

Version 127.0.2 Windows 11
creator: liar409

title: For the last couple of weeks after logging into Instagram or Facebook or Disney+ or Paramount+ or X I get an email from them that says I logged in from a device I don't usually use. Really annoying and also concerning. Can I fix this somehow?
content: I don't know why or if it's related to Firefox, but For the last couple of weeks after logging into Instagram or Facebook or Disney+ or Paramount+ or X I get an email from them that says I logged in from a device I don't usually use. I have had the same device for several years. Getting those emails is annoying and also concerning. Can I fix this somehow? FYI I use Duck Duck Go via Firefox for my internet searches.
creator: chktur

title: How to export bookmarks (and history, if possible)
content:
I just got this new computer and want to transfer my FireFox bookmarks and history to it. I cannot access my old account because I do not have access to that email anymore, and you require me to get a code sent to that email to log in. That is still on my old computer that was originally running Windows 8, and has been deteriorating ever since Microsoft jammed Windows 10 down it's throat.

I might still be able to export the bookmarks if there is some way to do that.

The best way would be if I could access to that old account without needing to access bonin006@umn.edu my current email is wayne@nano-dyne.com

Please see if there is a way to help me.

Thanks, Wayne Bonin
creator: bonin006

title: Updates disabled by your system administrator - cannot update since v122.0.1 MAC
content:
Have a macbook pro. Have not updated firefox in a while due to this message I get when i go to "about firefox" "Updates disabled by your system administrator" This is my personal laptop for the last few years, nobody has ever used it. I AM the administrator. Many posts online about this message for windows and linux but cannot find a fix for Mac, or why this is happening.

How do i update please? Having a lot of latency issues of late so need to update.
creator: Glacier
